name: FastGo Running
description:
We present to your attention the game where you will pass the different levels. Levels are luminous neon platforms, which are located at different angles. The player has the ability to jump with a boost, thanks to which you will move. Also you have the ability to run on vertical platforms. At each level there are targets and in order to move to the next level, it is necessary to shoot some of targets to get a certain number of points.

Features
-The graphics are realised in neon style
-Different puzzles
-Soundtrack
